title: FS: Black Sox Collection full of Rarities
author: Epps

posts.post_title: FS: Black Sox Collection full of Rarities
posts.post_content:
I have collected the Black Sox for 15 years, but am thinking of selling my  collection and am taking offers on all cards. Please shoot me a PM or a text (574-849-2085) if you're interested and I can send over pictures. I check the board once a day after work, so if you PM me, it'll be the evening before I respond. Obviously text is more immediate.

-1910 Plow Boy Tobacco Chick Gandil (SGC 40). Ad Back
-1911 T212 Obak Buck Weaver (PSA 4MK). Has a stamp on the back
-111 T205 Sovereign Eddie Cicotte (PSA 5)
-1912 C46 Chick Gandil (SGC 84). The best example that I have ever seen.
-1914 T213 Type 2 Chick Gandil (SGC 30). Cleveland.
- 1914 T213 Type 2 Chick Gandil. (SGC 40). Washington.


Above are just the Tobacco cards that I have.
I also have many non-tobacco cards of the Sox and have included the link to that thread below.

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=273167[/url]





Thanks for taking a look and text me if you would like pictures!
